2.title: New Zealand v Wales 1987

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: THE SECOND SEMI-FINAL WAS A ONE SIDED AFFAIR WITH NEW ZEALAND SIMPLY UNSTOPPABLE SCORING 8 TRIES IN A 49-6 WIN WHICH ALSO SAW HUW RICHARDS BECOME THE FIRST PLAYER TO BE SENT OF AT A RUGBY WORLD CUP.

3.title: New Zealand v France 1987

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: THE FINAL PROVED A MATCH TOO FAR FOR FRANCE WITH NEW ZEALAND, WHO WERE UNQUESTIONABLY THE BEST TEAM IN THE TOURNAMENT, EMERGING THE 29-9 WINNERS TO ALLOW CAPTAIN DAVID KIRK TO LIFT THE WEBB ELLIS CUP.

4.title: Scotland v Ireland 1991

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: SCOTLAND FIND THEMSELVES TRAILING AT THE BREAK AND REQUIRING A BIG SECOND HALF EFFORT TO OVERTURN A DEFICIT. FROM 12-9 DOWN, SCOTLAND WIN THE ENCOUNTER 24-15.

5.title: Australia v New Zealand 1991

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: AUSTRALIA END NEW ZEALANDS REIGN WITH A 16-6 VICTORY.

6.title: Ireland v Australia 1991

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: AUSTRALIA EDGED THROUGH TO THE SEMI FINALS WITH A LAST DITCH MICHAEL LYNAGH EFFORT THAT SAW IRELANDS 18-15 LEAD DISSAPEAR IN THE BLINK OF AN EYE.

7.title: England v Australia 1991

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: A CAPACITY CROWD AT TWICKENHAM WATCH AUSTRALIA TRIUMPH 12-6 AGAINST AN ENGLAND SIDE THAT HAD SUDDENLY ABANDONED THEIR FEARED FORWARD APPROACH TO PLAY A RUNNING GAME.

8.title: England v Australia 1995

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: THE MATCH OF THE QUARTER-FINALS AND A GAME WON BY ENGLAND 25-22 AFTER ROB ANDREWS INJURY-TIME DROP GOAL AND ONE THAT SAW MICHAEL LYNAGH BECOME THE FIRST PLAYER TO REACH 900 TEST MATCH POINTS.

9.title: France v South Africa 1995

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: TORRENTIAL RAIN HAD TURNED THE KINGS PARK PITCH INTO A LAKE FOR THE SOUTH AFRICA FRANCE SEMI-FINAL, A MATCH THAT ENDS 19-15 IN THE SPRINGBOKS FAVOUR.

10.title: New Zealand v England 1995

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: RUGBY, WHICH WOULD TURN PROFESSIONAL JUST TWO MONTHS AFTER THE WORLD CUP, HAD A NEW STAR WITH LOMU SCORING FOUR OF NEW ZEALANDS SIX TRIES IN THEIR 45-26 VICTORY IN CAPE TOWN

11.title: South Africa v New Zealand 1995

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: NELSON MANDELA PRESENTS THE TROPHY TO FRANCOIS PIENAAR TO THE DELIGHT OF THE CAPACITY CROWD AT ELLIS PARK IN JOHANNESBURG. JOEL STRANSKYS LATE DROP GOAL IN EXTRA TIME HANDS SOUTH AFRICA A FAMOUS WIN.

12.title: Australia v France 1999

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: JOHN EALES CAPTAINED HIS AUSTRALIA SIDE TO WORLD CUP VICTORY AS HIS SIDE MADE HISTORY, BECOMING THE FIRST TEAM IN THE SHORT FOUR YEAR HISTORY OF THE WEBB ELLIS TROPHY TO LIFT IT TWICE.

13.title: Wales v Samoa 1999

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: ALTHOUGH WALES COULDNT MANAGE VICTORY OVER SAMOA IN THIS EXCITING BATTLE, THEIR HIGH SCORING THROUGHOUT THE POOL STAGES SECURED THEM TOP SPOT AND EDGED SAMOA INTO 2ND PLACE.

14.title: France v New Zealand 1999

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: FRANCE LOOKED DOWN AND OUT IN LONDON TRAILING BY FOURTEEN POINTS EARLY IN THE SECOND-HALF ONLY TO COME OFF THE ROPES AND STORM PAST THE ALL-BLACKS.

15.title: Australia v South Africa 1999

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: THE SPRINGBOKS FINALLY LOST THEIR PROUD RECORD OF NEVER HAVING LOST A WORLD CUP GAME TO A WALLABY SIDE THAT SHOWED ITS GRIM DETERMINATION BY SECURING THE WIN IN EXTRA TIME.

16.title: Scotland v Fiji 2003

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: SCOTLAND PROP TOM SMITH SCORED TWO MINUTES FROM TIME TO BOOK HIS SIDES PLACE IN THE QUARTER-FINALS WITH A THRILLINGLY TENSE WIN OVER FIJI.

17.title: England v Australia 2003

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: ENGLAND WIN THE RUGBY WORLD CUP WITH A BREATHTAKING JONNY WILKINSON DROP GOAL JUST 26 SECONDS FROM THE END OF A THRILLING FINAL IN SYDNEY.

18.title: Australia v New Zealand 2003

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: REIGNING CHAMPIONS AUSTRALIA MARCHED INTO THE RUGBY WORLD CUP FINAL WITH A CLINICAL DEMOLITION OF TOURNAMENT FAVOURITES NEW ZEALAND.

19.title: England v Wales 2003

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: ENGLAND BOOKED THEIR PLACE IN THE WORLD CUP SEMI-FINALS, BUT ONLY AFTER WALES GAVE THEM A HUGE SCARE IN BRISBANE

20.title: England v France 2003

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: ENGLAND BOOKED THEIR PLACE IN THE WORLD CUP FINAL AGAINST AUSTRALIA WITH A TENSE VICTORY OVER FRANCE IN APPALLING CONDITIONS IN SYDNEY.

21.title: New Zealand v France 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

21.plot: FRANCE SET UP A WORLD CUP SEMI-FINAL WITH ENGLAND AFTER A STUNNING WIN OVER HOT FAVOURITES NEW ZEALAND IN CARDIFF.

22.title: England v France 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

22.plot: ARGENTINA ROCKED TOURNAMENT HOSTS FRANCE WITH A SENSATIONAL 17-12 VICTORY IN THE OPENING MATCH OF THE 2007 RUGBY WORLD CUP IN PARIS.

23.title: France v Argentina 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

23.plot: ARGENTINA ROCKED TOURNAMENT HOSTS FRANCE WITH A SENSATIONAL 17-12 VICTORY IN THE OPENING MATCH OF THE 2007 RUGBY WORLD CUP IN PARIS.

24.title: England v South Africa 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

24.plot: SOUTH AFRICA ENDED ENGLANDS REIGN AS WORLD CHAMPIONS AS THEY CLAIMED THE WORLD CUP FOR THE SECOND TIME.

25.title: South Africa v Fiji 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

25.plot: SOUTH AFRICA EDGED AN ABSORBING CLASH WITH THE EXCITING FIJIANS 37-20 TO BOOK A WORLD CUP SEMI-FINAL PLACE.

26.title: South Africa v Argentina 2007

episode of.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (TV Series 2011– )

26.plot: ENGLAND WILL FACE A WORLD CUP FINAL REUNION WITH THEIR POOL CONQUERORS SOUTH AFRICA AFTER THE SPRINGBOKS ENDED ARGENTINAS GLORIOUS RUN IN THE SEMIS.

imdb.plot outline: The Rugby World Cup has grown into one of the largest sporting events in the world, and has held witness to some of the greatest moments the sport has had to offer. Now 26 classic matches have been produced, bringing some of these most enthralling games, from one of the most exciting sporting competitions, into one unique collection.
imdb.title: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches
akas: Rugby World Cup Classic Matches (United Kingdom)
plot: The Rugby World Cup has grown into one of the largest sporting events in the world, and has held witness to some of the greatest moments the sport has had to offer. Now 26 classic matches have been produced, bringing some of these most enthralling games, from one of the most exciting sporting competitions, into one unique collection.
